article:
This page lists common abbreviations for grammatical terms that are used in
linguistic interlinear glossing.

Abbreviations beginning with (a common prefix for non-) or ending with (a common
suffix for -izer) may not be listed separately. For example, non-past}} and
transitivizer}} are not listed, as they are composable from non-}} + past}} and
transitive}} + -izer}}.
